DOC.brief_summary: Antibiotic eye drops are being used before and after intravitreal injections. Currently there is no study indicating the benefit of there usage or their dosage. In this study we compare the efficacy of Vigamox eye drops (antibiotic)starting 3 days prior to the injection versus 1 day prior to intravitreal injection.
DOC.brief_title: Dosage Study for Vigamox Eye Drops Prior to Intravitreal Injections
DOC.criteria: Patient who need intravitreal injections patients who are willing to participate in the study Patients who are allergic to Vigamox or who have taken any eye drops within the past 3 weeks
DOC.keyword: Vigamox, topical antibiotics, Intravitreal injections, macular degeneration, endophthalmitis
